title: The Baneful
content: The Baneful Rare 2~7 Damage 1d6 +1 PiercingThis blade's magical powers only function if it's Bound to an Eldritch Knight or is a Warlock's Pact Weapon. Favoured Weapon: This weapon has a +1 bonus to damage and attack rolls. Baneful Bond: On a hit, possibly Bane your target. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The wizard Otiluke wrote about bound weapons and their propensity to coalesce with their wielder as the pair come together.
